channel.title: drug on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in drug on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers' accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-02
item.description: DoorDash isn’t just delivering meals—it’s making them, too (3 minute read) DoorDash is opening a temporary kitchen to make meals for six restaurants in San Jose, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-19
item.description: Apple Hiring Engineers to Develop 6G Wireless (3 minute read) Apple recently posted job ads looking for wireless system research engineers for current and next-generation networks.
